<template>
    <!-- Canvas -->
    <canvas class="orb-canvas"></canvas>
</template>

<script>
import * as PIXI from "pixi.js";
import Orb from "../helpers/Orb";
import { KawaseBlurFilter } from "@pixi/filter-kawase-blur";

export default {
  name: "SweetBackground",
  components: {},
  mounted() {
    const app = new PIXI.Application({
      view: document.querySelector(".orb-canvas"),
      resizeTo: window,
      backgroundAlpha: 0,
    });

    app.stage.filters = [new KawaseBlurFilter(30, 20, true)];

    const orbs = [];

    let originX = window.innerWidth / 1.25;
    let originY =
      window.innerWidth < 1000
        ? window.innerHeight
        : window.innerHeight / 1.375;

    for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
      const orb = new Orb(0xff0000, originX, originY);
      app.stage.addChild(orb.graphics);

      orbs.push(orb);
    }

    originX = window.innerWidth * 0.2;
    originY = window.innerWidth < 1000 ? 0 : window.innerHeight * 0.275;

    for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
      const orb = new Orb(0x0000ff, originX, originY);
      app.stage.addChild(orb.graphics);

      orbs.push(orb);
    }

    if (!window.matchMedia("(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)").matches) {
      app.ticker.add(() => {
        orbs.forEach((orb) => {
          orb.update();
          orb.render();
        });
      });
    } else {
      orbs.forEach((orb) => {
        orb.update();
        orb.render();
      });
    }
  },
};
</script>
